name: places/ChIJr7xas-xYwokRzJcQ8Lyw5iI
adrFormatAddress: 910 5th Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: I saw Dr. Airan last week to evaluate my lip. I wanted a fuller lip and showed a few photos of what I liked. I thought I needed one shape; but she recommended exactly what to do so I had the perfect natural lip shape. No one knows I’ve had anything done but I am OBSESSED. It looks so good and I feel so much more confident now. Not only that, her staff make you feel so taken care of! I had amazing follow-up with all my questions answered. Will definitely be back!

originalText.text: I’ve been a patient for almost 3 years and Dr. Airan is the only person I entrust with helping me age gracefully. She has a way of bringing out the best version of yourself and winding back the clock. I’m convinced she has the magical touch—somehow my Botox and face has never looked as good as when she’s taking care of it. She educates but doesn’t push and will always give it to you “straight”. Which I love. Recommend her hands down over anyone else I’ve ever gone to. She’s pricey as hell but SO worth it!

originalText.text:
Wow! I have no words for how incredible Dr Airan and her team are.

Dr Airan is a highly experienced board certified dermatologist with a discerning eye for detail. Everything she does is subtle and meticulous — her work is truly the perfect balance of artistry, aesthetics and medicine.

I first came to Dr Airan seeking anti-aging and facial asymmetry treatments. Not only did Dr Airan restore and enhance my natural beauty and vibrancy, but she also helped me regain my confidence!

I’ve now been a patient of Dr Airan’s for 10 years and have had a wide range of cosmetic procedures including botox and fillers. I've loved all of my results over the years and would never trust anyone else with my skin! Dr Airan is also very conscientious, personable and honest. She has excellent judgement and really cares about delivering outstanding results with proper attention to ensuring you feel safe and comfortable along the way.

Dr Airan’s team (including Janine and Nurse Practitioner Kristina) is top notch. They’re very thorough, friendly and care about each patient’s experience. I’m always so impressed with the level of expertise and quality of care.

Dr Airan is considered one of the best in her industry for a reason!

originalText.text: Dr. Airan is a perfectionist and skilled injector who will not be satisfied until you get the result you are looking for.   She has years of experience under her belt and I would feel comfortable receiving any treatment from her.  Her skilled injection techniques are so natural, but make me look (and feel) like a more rested and  beautiful version of myself.  The confidence I have after treatment with Dr. Airan is priceless.

originalText.text: Dr. Lisa Airan is great! I was looking for a dermatologist after a not so good visit with someone else a few years ago. She was very honest since my first visit and asked me to always let her know if I was not satisfied with her work. I’ve been more than satisfied and very happy with all the procedures I’ve had done. Dr. Airan is very professional, offers guidance, open to questions and will not do unnecessary procedures. She has a wonderful staff as well. I highly recommend her.
